onedcx:simpleDc.dcterms:title: WRF runs for Alaska 2000-2009 (30km horizontal resolution)
onedcx:simpleDc.dcterms:subject: WRF model, high resolution climate dataset
Alaska

onedcx:dcTerms.dcterms:abstract: WRF (Weather Research and Forecast) model run for Alaska driven by NCEP/NCAR Reanalysis data was conducted for 10 year period (2000-2009). The dataset is currently uploaded on IARC climate data server. The amount of data is about 1Tb and it can be made available upon request (valexeev@iarc.uaf.edu).
